author: scoochmaroo
description: A quick and easy chocolate cake you can make in a mug in just 5 minutes. Perfect for a rich, instant dessert.

ingredients.name: whisked egg
ingredients.notes: 1 whole egg is too much; 2 tablespoons is ideal

ingredients.name: chocolate chips
ingredients.notes: or use broken up candy bar pieces

optional_variations: For a fudgier version, omit the egg.
Experiment with different flavorings or chocolate types.

steps.title: Mix Dry Ingredients
steps.instructions: Add all dry ingredients to the mug and mix well.

steps.title: Add Wet Ingredients
steps.instructions: Add the egg and combine thoroughly. Stir in milk and oil until smooth.

steps.title: Add Chocolate and Flavoring
steps.instructions: Add chocolate chips and a splash of vanilla (or chosen flavor). Stir until well combined.

steps.title: Microwave
steps.instructions: Microwave for 3 minutes in a 1000w microwave, or 4 minutes in a 700w microwave. Cake will rise above the mug and collapse once done.

steps.title: Experiment and Adjust
steps.instructions: Adjust cooking time or ingredient ratios based on your microwave and preference. Take notes on variations to find your ideal texture.

notes: Microwave times vary by wattage â€” start with less time and add more if needed.
Omitting the egg creates a denser, fudgier cake.
The cake will collapse slightly after microwaving; this is normal.
